txt.en: Lugazag is fallen to the Army of Angmar
Another has informed the Captain-General, support arrives shortly
Lugazag is now under the control of the Free Peoples. In order to keep the tower under the ownership of the Free People reinforcements must be called to defend its walls.

'This victory is hard won, and we must act swiftly to see that it is not in vain. The close proximity of the Enemy to this tower makes the acquisition of more forces imperative.

'I need you to make your way to Glân Vraig to request those reinforcements from Captain-General Tordúr.

'Be swift and safe and tell the Captain-General of our need.'
Glân Vraig lay far to east and south of Lugazag.\n\nAfter taking Lugazag away from the Enemy, the army of the Free Peoples have sent you to Glân Vraig to request reinforcements for the tower.
'Forces will be dispatched to the tower at once. This news is well-received, my friend.'
'Word must reach the Captain-General that Lugazag is wrested from the foe.'
Talk to Tordúr at Glân Vraig
Angmar's Army must not control Lugazag
Support must not be present at Lugazag
